title: Gallic War 5 37 - we learn in lines 3-5

content.question: In lines 3-5 (Tum vero... perturbant), we learn that the

choices.label: Gauls raised a battle cry and attacked
Romans held to their customary formation
Gauls won a victory without casualties
Roman ranks threw the Gauls into confusion

content.answer: Gauls raised a battle cry and attacked
